mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MARKETINFO( EMAIL_MARKET, PWD_MARKET, NAME_MARKET, NAME_BOSS, ADDR1_MARKET, ADDR2_MARKET, CNUM_MARKET ) VALUES ( #{email_market}, #{pwd_market}, #{name_market}, #{name_boss}, #{addr1_market}, #{addr2_market}, #{cnum_market} )
mapper.select:
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS EXISTS_YN FROM MARKETINFO WHERE EMAIL_MARKET=#{email_market}
